ValidationRule.description: " (ROOFPRO)" should be appended to the ROOFPRO Account Name.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED( Name ), OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = "IKOPRO_Contractor", RecordType.DeveloperName = "IKOPRO_Contractor_HA_OK"), RIGHT(Name , 10) <> " (ROOFPRO)", CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "IKO") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please make sure " (ROOFPRO)" is appended to the Company Name. In case of questions, please contact the ROOFPRO Team.
